sentences.en: ...a table festooned with a cornucopia of fruit.
As we sit down this week to give thanks, investors face a cornucopia of blessings.
sentences.cn: 本周我们坐下来感恩的时候, 丰饶的恩赐摆在投资者面前.

sentences.en: But METAL and EARTH does have the magical power to ensnare me in this cornucopia.
sentences.cn: 但[金]与[土]就是有着一份魔力,让我忘返的溜连这个大观园.
(象征丰饶的)角雕刻-自然的赠物.

sentences.en: Cornucopia win, barren hills greenwood change.
sentences.cn: 要得聚宝盆, 荒山变绿林.

sentences.en: Group located in Basin ChaiDdmu, which is the prestigious cornucopia in Town Haixi of Qinghai province.
sentences.cn: 公司坐落在享有“聚宝盆”美称的中国青海省海西洲柴达木盆地.

sentences.en: He is often associated with a sceptre, cornucopia , or Cerburus, the three - headed dog.
sentences.cn: 他常与节杖, 丰饶之角, 三个头的地狱看门狗有关.

sentences.en: Our cornucopia is the human mind and heart.
sentences.cn: 我们富足是由于人类的智慧和热情.

sentences.en: The book is a cornucopia of good ideas.
sentences.cn: 这部书里有无数好主意。

sentences.en: The book is a cornucopia of information.
The symbols of Helios were a crown a cornucopia, and a ripened fruit.
sentences.cn: 赫利奥斯的象征物是马头、七彩王冠 、 羊角盛器和成熟的水果.

sentences.en: What awaits him in the deep bowels of The Isle of Cornucopia?
sentences.cn: 等待他的深菩萨岛的聚宝盆?

words.tran_cn: 冠状的；日冕的；头颅的；花冠的；舌尖音的

trans.tran_en: a container in the shape of an animal’s horn, full of fruit and flowers, used to represent a time when there are large supplies of food
